nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: All systems green. Launch sequence complete. The U.E.S. Meridian is away. Captain, the frontier awaits. Your orders for our initial course?

choices.text: Chen, lay out the navigational options.
[Leadership] "To the crew of the Meridian: we carry the hopes of Earth. Make her proud."
[Previous Loop] "I have a bad feeling about the standard route. Chen, plot a course through the Serpent's Nebula. And divert auxiliary power to the forward shields."

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Simple, Captain. The quickest way to the Prometheus beacon is a straight line. The pirates and anomalies can try their luck. We're the Federation's finest. Let's show them what that means.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: Respectfully, Captain, a straight line is a good way to get killed. The established trade lanes are safer. They'll add three days to our journey, but they're patrolled and mapped. The direct route takes us through uncharted territory with known gate instability.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: An unusual request, Captain. That route is not recommended. But your orders are clear. Adjusting course.

choices.text: We take the safe route. No unnecessary risks on day one.
We take the direct route. We have a mission to complete.
[Reconnaissance] "Check the latest reports from the gate network. Any new anomalies on either route?"

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Analyzing... A previously unknown gravimetric anomaly has been detected on the 'safe' route. The direct route remains unchanged but is still considered high-risk.

choices.text: We'll proceed on the safe route, but with caution.
The devil you know... We'll take our chances with the direct route.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have chosen the cautious path. The journey will be longer, but hopefully safer.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have chosen the direct path. The journey will be faster, but fraught with peril.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your foreknowledge has set you on an unexpected path from the very beginning.
